# Concise Summary of the Site's Purpose
# This helps models quickly understand what we do.
Summary: AI CV Optimizer is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) tool that uses AI to tailor resumes and CVs to specific job descriptions. Users provide a job URL and their current CV; the tool rewrites the CV to be optimized for Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) by matching keywords and skills. The service costs $1 per optimization.
